name: Jubox 2
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/882360/Blind_Bird/?snr=1_5_1100__1100

We are controlling a small box and this box likes to jump and can be a little bit stingy and target is jump and collect the diamonds. While you are trying to catch the diamonds at the same time try to arrive the highest peak. By the way, something will have followed from your behind it's kind of stripe, you have to be careful about the ''stripe'' while you are collecting the diamonds.


  • Key Features:

  • Level to infinity
  • Jump Forever.
  • Minimalistic Design.
  • You need a quick reflex.
